name: Super Robot Taisen Compact 2 Dai-3-bu Ginga Kessen Hen
description:
The third and final part of the sequel to Super Robot Wars/Taisen Compact.

After prolonged battles on Earth and around its surrounding colonies, the heroes discover that the threat of the new enemy lies in the far reaches of space. Ky?suke Nanbu and Excellen Browning, the protagonists of the game, now finally reunited, decide to participate in the final conflicts not only for Earth, but for the entire galaxy.

Like the previous parts, the game allows players to transfer data from the previous games. Doing so nets players bonuses that can help them throughout the campaign. Of course, it is entirely possible to launch and play the game without transferring any data.
